name: Ancona + Associates, Inc.
description: Experience strategy & design for visitor attractions, retail experiences and digital environments.
business_model: Core team of creative leaders assembling seasoned associates on a project basis, with over 30 years of experience managing multi-disciplinary projects for museums, government agencies, and global corporations. Focus on client needs with on-demand methodologies and virtual services.

key_people.name: Tomas Ancona
key_people.bio: Tomas Ancona has over thirty years of international experience designing and directing large-scale interdisciplinary projects for government, cultural and corporate clients. He has a background in architecture and design, and has held leadership roles including Global Creative Director of Nike Retail.
